info.name: Emgage Platform - API Test Suite
info.description: This Collection contains Postman API Tests for all the Entities of Emgage Platform.

item.name: Value Definition
Create ValueDef Request : Unit Tests

body.raw:
{
  "name" : "valueDef{{randomValue}}",
  "uri" : "valueDef{{randomValue}}",
  "description" : "This is new valueDef!",
  "valueDefPrimitives" : [
    {
      "Name": "vvValue premitivevalueDef11{{randomValue}}",
      "Uri":"privalueDef11{{randomValue}}",
      "Description":"This is new value primitive!!",
      "PrimitiveValueType": 1,
      "Required": 0,
      "ValueHint":"test"
    },
    {
      "Name":"Value premitivevalueDef1{{randomValue}}",
      "Uri":"privalueDef1{{randomValue}}",
      "Description":"vvvalue primitive-desc2022",
      "PrimitiveValueType":1,
      "Required":1,
      "ValueHint":"test1"
    }]
}
